title: Deep Maroon Prince Coat (PC-000440)
description:
Description :
Our Ruby Prism prince coats seamlessly blend traditional elegance with modern craftsmanship, featuring exquisite hand embroidery, precise machine embroidery, and detailed thread work on luxurious Raw Silk fabric. Each prince coat is meticulously crafted—hand embroidery adds a unique, artisanal charm, while machine embroidery ensures intricate and uniform patterns. The thread work adds depth and richness, elevating the overall design of the coat. The satin fabric, with its smooth, lustrous texture, serves as the perfect foundation, enhancing the embroidery and providing both comfort and sophistication. These elements combine to create a prince coat that embodies cultural heritage while offering a refined, contemporary style.
Fabric Based : Raw Silk
Embellishment Technique : Machine Embroidery
Note :
This outfit is not available for ready-to-wear purchase. Hence, you may inquire about getting it customized.
The prices may very according to the customization.

title: Jet Black Waistcoat (WC-000010)
description:
Description :
Our Raven Blossom waistcoats beautifully blend traditional elements with modern craftsmanship, featuring intricate hand embroidery, precise machine embroidery, and detailed thread work on refined satin fabric. Each waistcoat is meticulously crafted—hand embroidery adds a unique, artisanal touch, while machine embroidery offers detailed, consistent designs. The thread work adds texture and depth, enhancing the waistcoat's visual appeal. The smooth and lustrous satin fabric serves as the perfect backdrop, accentuating the embroidery and ensuring the waistcoat is both comfortable and sophisticated. These elements unite to create a versatile, elegant waistcoat that embodies both cultural heritage and contemporary style.
Fabric Based : Satin
Embellishment Technique : Machine Embroidery

title: Alpine Merino Woolen Fabric
description:
Crafted from
100% Super 110 Merino Wool
with ultra-fine
17.5-micron fibers
, ALPINE offers unparalleled softness and durability. Its
fabric construction
, made from the finest worsted wool, ensures a smooth drape and luxurious texture, perfect for high-end suiting. With natural
wool defection
properties such as stretch, wrinkle resistance, temperature regulation, and odor resistance, it guarantees year-round comfort and performance. Enhanced by
top dyeing
for vibrant, fade-resistant colors, ALPINE’s breathable and moisture-wicking design keeps you cool, dry, and elegant in any climate. The ALPINE Fabric is used for Shalwar Suit Fabric.
Care Instructions:
Professional dry cleaning is fine, but dry-cleaning fluid can be harsh on natural fibers.

title: Santro Merino Woolen Fabric
description:
Crafted from Merino Wool, this stretchy, crease-free fabric offers breathability, water resistance, and thermal insulation. Known for its fabric quality as a durable wool blend with thickness microns of 50, it combines natural and synthetic fibers for unique textures. With a fabric construction ideal for suiting, it features microns of 21-22, ensuring a soft and wrinkle-resistant finish. Its wool defection properties include temperature regulation, antibacterial benefits, and odor resistance, perfect for year-round use. The blend description highlights lightweight tropical wool for mild climates, while its breathable nature keeps you cool
and dry. Color fastness is ensured with top-dye techniques, offering vibrant, long-lasting hues.
Care Instructions:
Professional dry cleaning is fine, but dry-cleaning fluid can be harsh on natural fibers.

title: Pearl White Sherwani (Sher-000777)
description:
Description :
Our Ivory Axis sherwanis combine tradition and modern craftsmanship, featuring hand embroidery, machine embroidery, and intricate thread work on luxurious satin fabric. Each piece is designed with precision, where hand embroidery adds a unique, artisanal touch, machine embroidery offers consistent, detailed patterns, and thread work brings texture and depth. The smooth, glossy satin serves as the perfect canvas, enhancing the intricate designs and ensuring the sherwani is both comfortable and visually stunning. These elements come together to create a sophisticated garment that reflects cultural heritage and timeless elegance
Fabric Based : Satin
Embellishment Technique : Machine & Hand Embroidery
Note :
This outfit is not available for ready-to-wear purchase. Hence, you may inquire about getting it customized.
The prices may very according to the customization.

description:
Its perfect fit, this garment offers a snug embrace around the body while leaving room for comfort in the sleeves and waist. With no tapering, it presents a relaxed silhouette, perfect for your everyday style.
Composition & Care:
Fabric: 100% Cotton
Machine wash with a gentle cycle, up to 30°C (86°F).
void bleaching.
Iron at temperatures up to 110°C (230°F).
Do not iron directly on prints, embroidery, or embellishments.
Do not dry clean.
Avoid tumble drying.
